ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_sat: Grants hunger saturation to target. Can be amplified to increase saturation given.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_sum: Summons three common animals nearby. Can be amplified to summon more at once.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_shi: Grants heavy damage resistance for a brief moment. Protection period can be extended.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_abs: Grants temporary extra hearts, up to an extra bar. Amount given can be increased with Amplify.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_clo: Targets the closest player that isn't you within 16 blocks. Augmenting with AOE increases max distance by 16 blocks.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_tra: Transmutes a Source Gem in your inventory into one or more of a random item. Can be augmented by Fortune to increase max items gained. Can also be augmented with Extreme to raise chances for better items.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_bur: Buries the target two blocks below. Amplify increases blocks dropped, Dampen decreases blocks dropped.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_sum: Summons three common hostile mobs. Can be amplified/dampened twice to change amount summoned. Augmenting with Extreme spawns creepers, with Sensitive spawns less uncommon mobs.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_ext: Increases chances for more dangerous or beneficial results from some spells. Very expensive.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_cre: Generates Source and places it in a Source container within 6 blocks. Amplify/dampen to change how much is added.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_rep: Somewhat repairs the durability of one item in an affected player's inventory.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_tar: Causes all following spell effects to fire on the caster.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_ret: Teleports an effected player back to their spawn point. Doesn't work on mobs, or if the player hasn't set a spawn point.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_set: Sets the spawn for the caster at their current position.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_atr: Causes the target to suffer from weakness for a period of time.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_fer: Only applicable to animals. If the animal is a baby, it will speed up the growing process. Otherwise, it will reset the breeding cooldown.
ars_extended_glyphs.glyph_desc.glyph_abo: Retargets the spell to one block above the current target's position.
aeg.passive_caster.desc: Casts the inscribed spell periodically using a Self glyph. Activation rate can be changed by adding Extend Time or Duration Down at the start.
ars_extended_glyphs.ritual_desc.ritual_d: Increases the world difficulty by one step. Augmenting with a feather causes it to step backwards.
tooltip.aeg.await: Hold Left Shift for more info.
aeg.message.herobrine: Internal exception: java.io.IOException: Attempting to invoke an invalid entity (??)
tooltip.aeg.blank_tablet_f: Can be enchanted to create resistance charms.
tooltip.aeg.tablet: Reduces the cost of glyphs in this school by 50 mana while equipped.
tooltip.aeg.tablet_warning: Will have Curse of Binding upon taking!
tooltip.refined_magestone: Can be used as a Spell Focus.
tooltip2.refined_magestone: Stacks up to 16, for a total of +80 Max Mana.
tooltip.aeg.tablet_f.air: Prevents fall damage at the cost of mana while equipped.
tooltip.aeg.tablet_f.fire: Prevents fire and lava damage at the cost of mana while equipped.
tooltip.aeg.tablet_f.earth: Prevents suffocation, slamming damage, and hot floors at the cost of mana while equipped.
tooltip.aeg.tablet_f.water: Prevents drowning and dragon's breath damage at the cost of mana while equipped.
jei.aeg.blank_tablet: Ancient Tablets can rarely be found in Nether Fortresses.
ars_extended_glyphs.adv.desc.has_enchant: Enchant an Ancient Tablet with an element
ars_extended_glyphs.adv.desc.has_bauble: Create and enchant a Bauble for protection against an element
